name: Elven Legacy: Magic
description: The era of Elven Legacy is coming to an end. The relentless wave of demonic magical energy triggered by the death of the demon Farrakh has swept the world and has now reached the free city of Sylent. Powerless, the Masters of the Academy of Magic are being driven insane.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.5 GHz Pentium IV; AMD 2000+ 1,5Ghz (Single Core) Memory: 512 MB Hard Disk Space: 3 GB of free space Video: nVidia GF FX 5700 or ATI Radeon 9600 128 MB Sound: DirectX-compatible DirectX®: DirectX 9.0c
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2.4 GHz Pentium IV; AMD 3500+ 2.2Ghz (Single Core) Memory: 1 GB Hard Disk Space: 3 GB of free space Video: nVidia GF 6800 or ATI Radeon R850XT с 256Мб Sound: DirectX-compatible DirectX®: DirectX 9.0c
